lines.text: What if... Slick put it on the bullet himself?
Like, he found one of their stickers, put it on a bullet, loaded it, then...
...No, wait, I don't think the spell works that way. There's no delayed effect.
More to the point, why would he set up his gun to shoot himself, anyway?
Yeah, uh... I thought I might cross that bridge when I came to it.
